general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs, schools, and initiatives at Sharda University for the 2025-26 academic year. It lists academic departments like Dental Sciences, Medical Sciences & Research, and Nursing Science & Research, alongside administrative and reporting functions such as Examination Annual Reports and Academic Bank of Credits. The content also highlights student-focused services including counseling, skill enhancement, entrepreneurship support, and awareness of technological trends, as well as broader university information like its history, leadership, and statutory bodies. Additionally, it mentions international collaborations, specific programs, and essential guidelines for students.

career_path.summary: This text outlines potential career paths following a course in humanities and social sciences, including opportunities for higher education such as M.Phil and Ph.D degrees, roles as writers, and positions as recruiters.
